Simplicity : The tasks should have a simple setup. All factors that make comparisons dif-ﬁcult should be removed. This encourages simple models instead of cumbersome pipelined approaches
Probing diverse aspects : The set of tasks should assess different capabilities of models like their ability to model relations and hierarchical/spatial structures, generalization capability, etc. 1
Long inputs : The input sequence lengths should be reasonably long since assessing how different models capture long-range dependencies is a core focus of LRA
